dc_description_s: point features showing towns   mountains on the routes from Madoi south to Qamdo;  digitized from P.K. Kozlov "Map of Eastern Tibet - Kham"  1900-1901  CHGIS V4 also provides supplemental datasets, including points derived from Russian Historical Maps, and other features that have been developed or processed from publicly available sources for use with CHGIS layers. -- text from CHGIS v4 CD-ROM.
dc_subject_sm: towns and natural features, Eastern Tibet
